events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to return it because it doesn't fit properly. Please advise on how to get a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request following the customer's stated reason for return and refund.
Assigning a customer service agent specialized in refunds to handle this case promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return to process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size, so I'd like to return it.
Thank you for the details. You can return the item using the prepaid shipping label attached to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we will initiate your full refund.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label, which makes returning easy.
We have received confirmation that the return label was emailed and the refund process is now complete once the jacket is received.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing the case now as the refund process completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
